            <string language="en">Animals in winter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tiere im Winter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Animaux en hiver</string>

            <string language="sl">Učna priprava na obravnavo teme \"živali pozimi\". Naloge, uganke, ...</string>
